english.segment1: Frost in the grass glitters. Dance in it barefoot for awhile. Until it hurts and I'll know it stings. Before turning numb. I guess you win and you lose some
english.segment2: We're at war. Realize this is a heart attack. One nation under attack. Heart is frozen but it's ready to crack
english.segment3: Frostbite biting slow. Turning blood and veins cold. Ice with claws climbing. Upwards my veins. But I will be searching. For a heart that won't get old
english.segment4: We're at war. Realize this is a heart attack. One nation under attack. Heart is frozen but it's ready to crack.
